players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who was found dead last night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and try to figure out what could have happened."
Diana: "I agree with Alice. Let's all be vigilant and try to uncover any clues that could help us understand what happened to Bob."

You: "I believe it's important that we all share any information we might have, no matter how insignificant it may seem. Let's try to remember if Bob mentioned anything unusual before his death or if he acted differently than usual during the day."
Charlie: "I remember Bob mentioning that he had received a threatening letter before his death. We should all be on high alert and share any suspicious information we come across."

Diana: "I remember Bob mentioning that he had received a threatening letter before his death. It's important that we all share any suspicious information we come across and take this threat seriously."
